item.title: ‘Mahabharata’ Gets Netflix India Animated Treatment With Epic Series ‘Kurukshetra’
item.description: Netflix India is venturing into animated mythology with “Kurukshetra,” a new series drawing from the ancient Indian epic the “Mahabharata.” The series will focus on the climact
